item.title: ‘My Life With the Walter Boys’ Star Nikki Rodriguez Explains Her Love Triangle Choice and Finale Confession
item.description: “I don’t know what comes after this," the actress tells THR of the Netflix show’s season ender that complicated things further for her relationships with Alex and Cole.

item.title: ‘My Life With the Walter Boys’ Star Nikki Rodriguez Is Learning to Let Go
item.description: The actress who plays Jackie in the hit Netflix teen drama is using what she learned from ‘On My Block’ to come out of her shell as season two lead.
